name: Grace's Diary
description:
"Grace's Diary" is an award winning serious game about teen dating violence and bystander awareness. This story-based game is from the perspective of Grace, a high school student, who is worried about her friend Natalie. Grace is worried that Natalie is in an abusive relationship and is trying to figure out how she can help her. With your help you'll help Grace explore her memories for instances of abuse in order to help her convince Natalie that she is in an abusive dating relationship. Can you help?

Grace's Diary was developed and designed by Guts (Hima) Rodsavas and Piti Yindee of GPTouch, Thailand.
